author: AP
title: U.S. 'wasted' months before preparing for virus pandemic
description: By that time, hospitals in several states were treating thousands of infected patients without adequate equipment and were pleading for shipments from the Strategic National Stockpile.
content: WASHINGTON: As the first alarms sounded in early January that an outbreak of a novel coronavirus in China might ignite a global pandemic, the Trump administration squandered nearly two months that could have been used to bolster the federal stockpile of criti… [+13317 chars]
